resources.string: The Family Tracker App consists of two modules of users(Gardian,Members). The members are allowed to be tracked by the gardian, gardian will see realtime location on google maps of their family members, Each family member will see only its own location on google map
Login as gardian to track your family members anytime, anywhere.
Login to make sure you are tracked by gardian
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
